name: GhostWithAGun
description:
You are a ghost who has found a shotgun, the other ghosts are now trying to steal it away from you because they are jealous, avoid the ghosts as they try to take your gun Controls - 
  • A and Left Arrow Key = Move Left
  • D and Right Arrow Key = Move Right
Objective -
  • Keep hold of the shotgun for as long as possible
  • Don't let the other ghosts get your gun!
  • If you go to the edge of the game you will get 20 seconds added to how long you lasted for the total time
Music by - 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG1G2FcKNXgcnggB-NAeroA
